tr_quotes.quote: 500 kalori tüketmek beş dakika, yakmak ise iki saat sürer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer devam edersen pişman olmayacaksın. Eğer vazgeçersen yapamayacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tek kötü antrenman, gerçekleşmeyen antrenmandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün sana imkansız gelen hareketler bir gün ısınma hareketlerin olacak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hedef ağırlığınıza ulaştığınızda hissedeceğiniz hissi düşünün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evet kilo vermek mümkün ve hayır, bu kolay değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En güzel giysilerinden biri kendi vücudundur. Ona iyi bak!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mazeretlerinizden daha güçlü olun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak için yemek yemeli, yemek için yaşamalı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi başkalarıyla karşılaştırmayın. Kendinizi dün olduğunuz kişiyle karşılaştırın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne istediğini değil, çalıştığın şeyi alırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bundan altı ay sonra kendinizi hayal edin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece denemeyi bıraktığında başarısız olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İstediğiniz beden için yiyin. Sahip olduğunuz beden için değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kilo verme zordur. Zor olanı seçin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sıska değil, formda olmak için egzersiz yapın. Vücudunuzu beslemek için yiyin ve nefret edenleri daima görmezden gelin. Fark ettiğinden daha değerlisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: 3 ay sonra kendinize teşekkür edeceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Değişme arzunuz aynı kalma arzunuzdan daha büyük olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bırakmak istediğiniz an itmeye devam etmeniz gereken andır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer baştan başlamaktan bıktıysanız vazgeçmeyi bırakın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yavaş ilerleme hiç ilerlememeden daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir saatlik egzersiz günün %4'üdür. Bahane yok!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dilemeyi kes. Yapmaya başla.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vazgeçmek üzereysen neden başladığını düşün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acı geçicidir, bırakma arzusu sonsuza dek sürer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kolay olacak mı? Hayır! buna değecek mi? Kesinlikle.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kimse sizin için yapamaz, kendiniz yapmanız gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bırakmak istediğin zaman. Neden başladığınızı kendinize sorun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kilo vermek bir akıl oyunudur. Fikrini değiştir. Vücudunu değiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kilo vermenin büyük bir kısmı bunu yapabileceğinize inanıyor ve bir gecede olmayacağını anlıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aynanıza bakın, bu sizin yarışmanız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başlamak için harika olmak zorunda değilsiniz, ama harika olmaya başlamak zorundasınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer baştan başlamaktan bıktıysanız vazgeçmeyi bırakın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Değişme arzunuz aynı kalma arzunuzdan daha büyük olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bırakmak istediğiniz an itmeye devam etmeniz gereken andır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer baştan başlamaktan bıktıysanız vazgeçmeyi bırakın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvet fiziksel kapasiteden gelmez. Yılmayan bir iradeden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Kilo vermek zordur. Fazla kilolu olmak zordur. Zoru seçin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece denemeyi bıraktığında başarısız olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bundan altı ay sonra kendinizi hayal edin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne istediğini değil, çalıştığın şeyi alırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a chef. But I'm passionate about food - the tradition of it, cooking it, and sharing it
en_quotes.author: Zac Posen

en_quotes.quote: Flowers always make people better, happier, and more helpful; they are sunshine, food and medicine for the soul
en_quotes.author: Luther Burbank

en_quotes.quote: Food is for eating, and good food is to be enjoyed... I think food is, actually, very beautiful in itself
en_quotes.author: Delia Smith

en_quotes.quote: The best way to celebrate the holidays is with some delicious food
en_quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

en_quotes.quote: The need for connection and community is primal, as fundamental as the need for air, water, and food
en_quotes.author: Dean Ornish

en_quotes.quote: By eating many fruits and vegetables in place of fast food and junk food, people could avoid obesity
en_quotes.author: David H. Murdock

en_quotes.quote: Eating good food is my favourite thing in the whole world. Nothing is more blissful
en_quotes.author: Justine Larbalestier

en_quotes.quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six
en_quotes.author: Yogi Berra

en_quotes.quote: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap
en_quotes.author: Kevin James

en_quotes.quote: The more colorful the food, the better. I try to add color to my diet, which means vegetables and fruits
en_quotes.author: Misty May-Treanor

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes a little comfort food can go a long way
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Bratt

en_quotes.quote: Thank you to our farmers for all you do to keep food on our tables
en_quotes.author: Elise Stefanik

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who's a chef, who loves food, ultimately knows that all that matters is: 'Is it good? Does it give pleasure?'
en_quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

en_quotes.quote: If you're a happy person around food, you can be a professional chef. It's fueled by passion
en_quotes.author: Ranveer Brar

en_quotes.quote: Once, during Prohibition, I was forced to live for days on nothing but food and water
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon
en_quotes.author: Doug Larson

en_quotes.quote: Good food is good food. It doesn't have to come with pretense
en_quotes.author: Christina Tosi

en_quotes.quote: If you're out, and starving, and need a bite to eat, then you need fast food
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Hoult

en_quotes.quote: Ice cream is my comfort food
en_quotes.author: Jessie Ware

en_quotes.quote: I like to eat in proportion, eat healthy, home-cooked food with lots of salad
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest
en_quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

en_quotes.quote: There's no such thing as 'bad' food or 'good' food
en_quotes.author: Ella Woodward

en_quotes.quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings
en_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

en_quotes.quote: I doubt whether the world holds for any one a more soul-stirring surprise than the first adventure with ice-cream
en_quotes.author: Heywood Broun

en_quotes.quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food
en_quotes.author: Hippocrates

en_quotes.quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments
en_quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

en_quotes.quote: The best comfort food will always be greens, cornbread, and fried chicken
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: If you have good food, people will come to your restaurant
en_quotes.author: Mickey Gilley

en_quotes.quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: Food is not rational. Food is culture, habit, craving and identity
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

en_quotes.quote: Everyone appreciates good food
en_quotes.author: Michael Seibel

en_quotes.quote: I can pick good food, but I can't pick a good man
en_quotes.author: Debbie Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: I have an enormous fondness for delicious food. It's very comforting
en_quotes.author: Teri Garr

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with eating Italian food is that five or six days later you're hungry again
en_quotes.author: George Miller

en_quotes.quote: Primarily I'm a meat man, although once in a while I toy with a few vegetables
en_quotes.author: Nat King Cole

en_quotes.quote: I'm obsessed with Chinese food and culture. It's food that I adore above all others
en_quotes.author: Andrew Zimmern

en_quotes.quote: He was a bold man that first ate an oyster
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: For me, Eid means having lots of yummy food
en_quotes.author: Nushrat Bharucha

en_quotes.quote: Know you food, know your farmers, and know your kitchen
en_quotes.author: Joel Salatin

en_quotes.quote: Chinese food tries to engage the mind, not just the palate. To provoke the intellect
en_quotes.author: Nicole Mones

en_quotes.quote: I still eat a burger at a counter with ketchup dripping down my face
en_quotes.author: Scarlett Johansson

en_quotes.quote: Food rules. Little rivals the pleasure of tearing into a glistening burger
en_quotes.author: Mary H.K. Choi

en_quotes.quote: You can go anywhere in the world, and people's faces light up when they put delicious food in their mouths
en_quotes.author: Sandi Toksvig

en_quotes.quote: A waffle is like a pancake with a syrup trap
en_quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

en_quotes.quote: You can do good work simply staying up all night and eating nothing but junk food, but probably not in the long term
en_quotes.author: John Mulaney

en_quotes.quote: Indian junk food is my sin, even though I pretend to like Japanese
en_quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: Everyone would be healthier if they didn't eat junk food
en_quotes.author: Robert Atkins

en_quotes.quote: It's like spicy food - sometimes you have to tone it down so more people can enjoy it
en_quotes.author: Babyface

en_quotes.quote: It is difficult to get organic food at most restaurants, so when possible, eat at home. When not, do your best
en_quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

en_quotes.quote: I'm not too into fast food, but you know if I was, it would be chicken
en_quotes.author: Giancarlo Esposito

en_quotes.quote: When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Gluttony is an emotional escape, a sign something is eating us
en_quotes.author: Peter De Vries

en_quotes.quote: Metaphysics is a restaurant where they give you a thirty thousand page menu, and no food
en_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

en_quotes.quote: He looked about as inconspicuous as a tarantula on a slice of angel food
en_quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

en_quotes.quote: Food brings people together on many different levels. It's nourishment of the soul and body; it's truly love
en_quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

en_quotes.quote: I love the masochistic aspect of eating seething, real Sichuan food in Sichuan Province
en_quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

en_quotes.quote: From dead plant matter to nematodes to bacteria, never underestimate the cleverness of mushrooms to find new food!
en_quotes.author: Paul Stamets

en_quotes.quote: I prefer more spicy food to your Italian to be fair
en_quotes.author: Peter Shilton

en_quotes.quote: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one
en_quotes.author: Mother Teresa

en_quotes.quote: I like food too much to go on some crazy diet. French fries are my favorite downfall
en_quotes.author: Holly Madison

en_quotes.quote: Italian food is all about ingredients and it's not fussy and it's not fancy
en_quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

en_quotes.quote: I'm something of a foodie, I guess, and I'm a big Chinese food fan
en_quotes.author: H. Jon Benjamin

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if you call a burger 'recession food.' It's comfort food
en_quotes.author: Michael Mina

en_quotes.quote: Use spices for flavor in food rather than adding a bunch of oils, fats, or sauces
en_quotes.author: Marisol Nichols

en_quotes.quote: I can't stay away from Chinese food. I really love that stuff
en_quotes.author: Shaun White

en_quotes.quote: Food is celebratory. People who don't cook don't know how much fun they're missing
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Statistics show that of those who contract the habit of eating, very few survive
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Ounce for ounce, herbs and spices have more antioxidants than any other food group
en_quotes.author: Michael Greger

en_quotes.quote: Appetite, craving for food, is a constant and powerful stimulator of the gastric glands
en_quotes.author: Ivan Pavlov

en_quotes.quote: If you see a black family, it's looting, but if it's a white family they are looking for food
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: I love eating junk food. I'm a huge snacker, chips and candy
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Lin

en_quotes.quote: Long as I was riding in a big Cadillac and dressed nice and had plenty of food, that's all I cared about
en_quotes.author: Etta James

en_quotes.quote: Say yes to everything. 'You want me to buy you some food?' Yes. 'You want me to buy you a car?' Yes
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: Hey, I used to eat at McDonald's: I liked the taste of the food, especially the French fries
en_quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

en_quotes.quote: Not like Chinese food, where you eat it and then you feel hungry an hour later
en_quotes.author: Ray Liotta

en_quotes.quote: To me, food is as much about the moment, the occasion, the location and the company as it is about the taste
en_quotes.author: Heston Blumenthal

en_quotes.quote: I could talk food all day. I love good food
en_quotes.author: Tom Brady

en_quotes.quote: Progress would not have been the rarity it is if the early food had not been the late poison
en_quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

en_quotes.quote: I was very impressed with the street food of Singapore. I was very impressed with the dishes that they did
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: Every time you use the word 'healthy,' you lose. The key is to make yummy, delicious food that happens to be healthy
en_quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

en_quotes.quote: Comfort food is really anything you want at that time. That said, I really love Naple-style pizza
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Zakarian

en_quotes.quote: My food demons are Chinese food, sugar, butter
en_quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

en_quotes.quote: Only the pure in heart can make a good soup
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: My favourite thing in the world is going out to get Chinese food, then coming home and renting a movie
en_quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

en_quotes.quote: Vegetarians are cool. All I eat are vegetarians - except for the occasional mountain lion steak
en_quotes.author: Ted Nugent

en_quotes.quote: If I'm going to eat fast food, I'm going to McDonald's. I don't need to pretend
en_quotes.author: Chrissy Teigen

en_quotes.quote: I'm kind of a homebody. I like to sit at home and watch movies and eat good food
en_quotes.author: Emilie de Ravin

en_quotes.quote: The most dangerous food is wedding cake
en_quotes.author: James Thurber

en_quotes.quote: If God did not intend for us to eat animals, then why did he make them out of meat?
en_quotes.author: John Cleese

en_quotes.quote: It's around the table and in the preparation of food that we learn about ourselves and about the world
en_quotes.author: Alice Waters

en_quotes.quote: Stay away from milk. It is nature's perfect food - but only if you are a calf
en_quotes.author: Mark Hyman

en_quotes.quote: For me, the good food starts with good product
en_quotes.author: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

en_quotes.quote: If I have one addiction in life, it's probably food
en_quotes.author: Liam Hemsworth

en_quotes.quote: I've always been able to cook Italian food. That's in my blood because I'm half Sicilian
en_quotes.author: Jen Lancaster

en_quotes.quote: The body needs food, warmth and water, but your heart needs more
en_quotes.author: Claire Cameron

en_quotes.quote: I'm a bit of a gourmet chef. I love cooking - mostly Thai food
en_quotes.author: Will Ferrell

en_quotes.quote: My three addictions of choice are food, love and work
en_quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

en_quotes.quote: I love to take something ordinary and make it really special
en_quotes.author: Ina Garten

en_quotes.quote: The murals in restaurants are on par with the food in museums
en_quotes.author: Peter De Vries

en_quotes.quote: I was eating bad stuff. Lots of sugar and carbs, junk food all the time. It makes you very irritated
en_quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

en_quotes.quote: Italian food really reflects the people. It reflects like a prism that fragments into regions
en_quotes.author: Lidia Bastianich

en_quotes.quote: A heart can no more be forced to love than a stomach can be forced to digest food by persuasion
en_quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

en_quotes.quote: I do not know that any writer has supposed that on this earth man will ultimately be able to live without food
en_quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

en_quotes.quote: Italian food is my favorite food. It's the most sophisticated eating system
en_quotes.author: Peter Gabriel

en_quotes.quote: I'm not very good with spicy food
en_quotes.author: Sarah Charles Lewis

en_quotes.quote: If your mother cooks Italian food, why should you go to a restaurant?
en_quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

en_quotes.quote: I love all kinds of bread. Whenever I crave junk food, I want salty things like peanuts or potato chips
en_quotes.author: Tyra Banks

en_quotes.quote: The kitchen oven is reliable, but it's made us lazy
en_quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

en_quotes.quote: You have to know the classics if you want to cook modern food
en_quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

en_quotes.quote: If we eat any food, or drink any beverage, we must recite a blessing over them before and after
en_quotes.author: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

en_quotes.quote: Chipotle is really showing that there's a better way to do fast food
en_quotes.author: Steve Ells

en_quotes.quote: If you want to eat well in England, eat three breakfasts
en_quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

en_quotes.quote: Sharing food with another human being is an intimate act that should not be indulged in lightly
en_quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

en_quotes.quote: A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk
en_quotes.author: James Joyce

en_quotes.quote: Wine and cheese are ageless companions, like aspirin and aches, or June and moon, or good people and noble ventures
en_quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

en_quotes.quote: We know that without food we would die. Without fellowship, life is not worth living
en_quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

en_quotes.quote: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Fettucini alfredo is macaroni and cheese for adults
en_quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

en_quotes.quote: Sandwiches are wonderful. You don't need a spoon or a plate!
en_quotes.author: Paul Lynde

en_quotes.quote: I'm just someone who likes cooking and for whom sharing food is a form of expression
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: I think people should eat vegetarian food for 20 days and then see the glow on their faces
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: I was always a junk food person, still am
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments
en_quotes.author: Chris Rock

en_quotes.quote: Provision as much pure and organic food as you can, and let the rest go by
en_quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

en_quotes.quote: I eat whatever I want, junk food included
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Marcil

en_quotes.quote: Words do two major things: They provide food for the mind and create light for understanding and awareness
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: You can't have a healthy civilization without healthy soil. You can't have junk food and have healthy people
en_quotes.author: Joel Salatin

en_quotes.quote: I don't eat fast food, but I can't live without pizza
en_quotes.author: Trevor Donovan

en_quotes.quote: I want my food dead. Not sick, not dying, dead
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Food was a labor of love you felt by cooking it and eating it
en_quotes.author: George Tillman, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Who doesn't like to get dressed up and eat good food?
en_quotes.author: Victoria Arlen

en_quotes.quote: Beware the hobby that eats
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I saw few die of hunger; of eating, a hundred thousand
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: At home, my food is just sort of comfort food. It's not super fancy, but it's certainly tasty
en_quotes.author: Anne Burrell

en_quotes.quote: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Food Stamp recipients didn't cause the financial crisis; recklessness on Wall Street did
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: I won't eat any cereal that doesn't turn the milk purple
en_quotes.author: Bill Watterson

en_quotes.quote: Man should not try to avoid stress any more than he would shun food, love or exercise
en_quotes.author: Hans Selye

en_quotes.quote: You can tell alot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: I'm totally obsessed with Italian food and Mexican food
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Hyman

en_quotes.quote: To be interested in food but not in food production is clearly absurd
en_quotes.author: Wendell Berry

en_quotes.quote: A lot of restaurants serve good food, but they don't have very good service
en_quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

en_quotes.quote: I really love good food occasionally, but I need time to enjoy it, and I need to be hungry
en_quotes.author: Clare Balding

en_quotes.quote: If you maintain a healthy diet, or at least are smart about your food choices, you'll still see the pounds come off
en_quotes.author: Misty May-Treanor

en_quotes.quote: It's difficult to believe that people are still starving in this country because food isn't available
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: My work has also motivated me to put a lot of time into seeking out good food and to spend more money on it
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: If I can, I love staying in pajamas all day and watching movies and eating good food
en_quotes.author: Becky G

en_quotes.quote: The shorter the chain between raw food and fork, the fresher it is and the more transparent the system is
en_quotes.author: Joel Salatin

en_quotes.quote: My weekend treat is Mexican food, definitely. I love nachos and burritos
en_quotes.author: Ashley Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Animals are my friends... and I don't eat my friends
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: What is poor? We had food. We dressed well. We didn't have a lot, but what we had fit, and it was always neat
en_quotes.author: Walter Payton

en_quotes.quote: My favorite time of day is to get up and eat leftovers from dinner, especially spicy food
en_quotes.author: David Byrne

en_quotes.quote: The food industry profits from providing poor quality foods with poor nutritional value that people eat a lot of
en_quotes.author: Mark Hyman

en_quotes.quote: Civilization as it is known today could not have evolved, nor can it survive, without an adequate food supply
en_quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

en_quotes.quote: What we get at home is 100% organic food. We are also 90% vegetarian
en_quotes.author: Manisha Koirala

en_quotes.quote: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food
en_quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme

en_quotes.quote: Buying food from farmers and people that I know adds that human element that I love
en_quotes.author: Alex Guarnaschelli

en_quotes.quote: Opening a family-style restaurant with comfort food like mac 'n' cheese, ribs and burgers has always been my dream
en_quotes.author: Bridget Hall

en_quotes.quote: All food is comfort food. Maybe I just like to chew
en_quotes.author: Lewis Black

en_quotes.quote: If we chew every morsel of our food, in that way we become grateful, and when you are grateful, you are happy
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Most fast food is fried. Fried food tastes great, and people don't seem to care about the fat aspect
en_quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

en_quotes.quote: Food is the essential thing to gaining weight. Protein, you know, that's basically it - protein
en_quotes.author: Manu Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I love food and I love my curves
en_quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

en_quotes.quote: Too many people just eat to consume calories. Try dining for a change
en_quotes.author: John Walters

en_quotes.quote: It is the food which you furnish to your mind that determines the whole character of your life
en_quotes.author: Emmet Fox

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather have a good food - lots and lots of different varieties of good foods - than search for something perfect
en_quotes.author: Bee Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Facts are to the mind what food is to the body
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: The food here is terrible, and the portions are too small
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: Promises and pie-crust are made to be broken
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: Spaghetti can be eaten most successfully if you inhale it like a vacuum cleaner
en_quotes.author: Sophia Loren

en_quotes.quote: My dad gave me the gene to enjoy cooking, and to enjoy consuming good food and wine
en_quotes.author: Danny Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Cultivation to the mind is as necessary as food to the body
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Thank you, horseradish, for being neither a radish nor a horse. What you are is a liar food
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

en_quotes.quote: Food should be fun
en_quotes.author: Thomas Keller

en_quotes.quote: Food is everything. Food, friends, family: Those are the most important things in life
en_quotes.author: Zac Posen

en_quotes.quote: Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Day

en_quotes.quote: Almost certainly, however, the first essential component of social justice is adequate food for all mankind
en_quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

en_quotes.quote: I grew up eating fried food. I thought that macaroni and cheese was a vegetable
en_quotes.author: Lauren Alaina

en_quotes.quote: I crave time in Yosemite like I crave food and water
en_quotes.author: Tommy Caldwell

en_quotes.quote: Without sharks, you take away the apex predator of the ocean, and you destroy the entire food chain
en_quotes.author: Peter Benchley

en_quotes.quote: I'm into mellow dates with really good food
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: My favorite power food is Greek yogurt and honey
en_quotes.author: Misty May-Treanor

en_quotes.quote: I don't find it a struggle to maintain a healthy diet now as my palate has changed. I don't crave rich food
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Ellison

en_quotes.quote: I only eat spicy food
en_quotes.author: Joshua Ledet

en_quotes.quote: We may find in the long run that tinned food is a deadlier weapon than the machine-gun
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: My weaknesses have always been food and men - in that order
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in twisting yourself into knots of excuses and explanations over the food you make
en_quotes.author: Julia Child

en_quotes.quote: I was 32 when I started cooking; up until then, I just ate
en_quotes.author: Julia Child

en_quotes.quote: We provide food that customers love, day after day after day. People just want more of it
en_quotes.author: Ray Kroc

en_quotes.quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet
en_quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps more than any other, the food industry is very sensitive to consumer demand
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: At home I serve the kind of food I know the story behind
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: Even if you don't think you can cook well, you can cook better than the food industry
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: I won't eat anything green
en_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

en_quotes.quote: Junk food drags you down
en_quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

en_quotes.quote: I love food and feel that it is something that should be enjoyed. I eat whatever I want. I just don't overeat
en_quotes.author: Tyra Banks

en_quotes.quote: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: When I tour, I stuff fridges full of organic food and stick to that
en_quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

en_quotes.quote: I'm a healthy eater, but I don't consider Chick-fil-A fast food
en_quotes.author: Kehlani

en_quotes.quote: Food is the moral right of all who are born into this world
en_quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

en_quotes.quote: Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you who you are
en_quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

en_quotes.quote: My number one elixir for anxiety? Comfort food
en_quotes.author: Katie Lee

en_quotes.quote: What I used to do between writing fits was feed my kids, ride my horse and go shopping for cat and dog food
en_quotes.author: Anne McCaffrey

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to spend my life not having good food going into my pie hole. That hole was made for pies
en_quotes.author: Paula Deen

en_quotes.quote: My feeling is that labels are for canned food... I am what I am - and I know what I am
en_quotes.author: Michael Stipe

en_quotes.quote: If beef is your idea of 'real food for real people', you'd better live real close to a real good hospital
en_quotes.author: Neal Barnard

en_quotes.quote: Healthy people eating healthy food should never need to take an antibiotic
en_quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

en_quotes.quote: I grew up playing music and enjoying good food, friends and family in my own backyard
en_quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

en_quotes.quote: New Zealand has better food - sorry, America
en_quotes.author: Steven Adams

en_quotes.quote: For me no good food is illuminated without acidity
en_quotes.author: Alex Guarnaschelli

en_quotes.quote: I eat junk food, cheesecake, cheese, pizza - but just lower amounts of it
en_quotes.author: JWoww

en_quotes.quote: I love spicy food, love it. But wasabi is just painful
en_quotes.author: Devon Werkheiser

en_quotes.quote: I don't eat fast food often, but I love tacos. I could write prophetically about how perfect the taco is
en_quotes.author: Ken Baumann

en_quotes.quote: We should all grow our own food and do our own waste processing, we really should
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: I'm certainly well taken care of in terms of food and clothes
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: Never order food in excess of your body weight
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: Every child, woman and man has a right to enough nutritious food for an active and healthy life
en_quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

en_quotes.quote: Eating rice cakes is like chewing on a foam coffee cup, only less filling
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: I will not eat oysters. I want my food dead. Not sick. Not wounded. Dead
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: When I'm under stress, I do yoga. It's when I'm happiest that I have a problem with junk food
en_quotes.author: Britney Spears

en_quotes.quote: One should eat to live, not live to eat
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: I hid myself in food
en_quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

en_quotes.quote: Italy will always have the best food
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: Food is really important to me
en_quotes.author: Chrissy Teigen

en_quotes.quote: There's no denying that candy is comfort food and it's affordable
en_quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

en_quotes.quote: Most vegetarians look so much like the food they eat that they can be classified as cannibals
en_quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

en_quotes.quote: Nobody trusts the industrial food system to give them good food
en_quotes.author: Joel Salatin

en_quotes.quote: Sadly, in the name of progress, we have polluted the air, water, soil and the food we eat
en_quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

en_quotes.quote: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience
en_quotes.author: Kimbal Musk

en_quotes.quote: I love comfort food - it's the basis of everything
en_quotes.author: Katie Lee

en_quotes.quote: Our lives are not in the lap of the gods, but in the lap of our cooks
en_quotes.author: Lin Yutang

en_quotes.quote: I love good food but I follow strict rules the days I perform
en_quotes.author: Jose Carreras

en_quotes.quote: I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants
en_quotes.author: A. Whitney Brown

en_quotes.quote: People need dreams, there's as much nourishment in 'em as food
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Gilman

en_quotes.quote: I can celebrate food anytime. I love cheese. When I crave a certain food, I just eat it
en_quotes.author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

en_quotes.quote: Panda - We're not really selling Chinese food, you know. Our real purpose is about developing people
en_quotes.author: Andrew Cherng

en_quotes.quote: I can pretty much live without fast food. I haven't eaten McDonald's in so long, but it's okay
en_quotes.author: Ed Westwick

en_quotes.quote: In the 1950s, as food rationing ended, I remember a plentiful supply of sweets for the first time
en_quotes.author: Robert Powell

en_quotes.quote: Human beings do not eat nutrients, they eat food
en_quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

en_quotes.quote: Why does man kill? He kills for food. And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport
en_quotes.author: Julia Child

en_quotes.quote: So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: More die in the United States of too much food than of too little
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: The highlight of my childhood was making my brother laugh so hard that food came out of his nose
en_quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

en_quotes.quote: The lunch in a normal American restaurant is very problematic for me. I don't like to have hot food for lunch
en_quotes.author: Larry David

en_quotes.quote: I'm very honest about my food background; I've never tried to pretend like I was a chef
en_quotes.author: Antoni Porowski

en_quotes.quote: A third of our food comes from pollinating plants
en_quotes.author: Louie Schwartzberg

en_quotes.quote: Buy foods from nearby farms and have that food served in the cafeteria
en_quotes.author: Alice Waters

en_quotes.quote: But once in a while you might see me at In and Out Burger; they make the best fast food hamburgers around
en_quotes.author: Thomas Keller

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy wine collecting and great food
en_quotes.author: Deep Roy

en_quotes.quote: I always say centered food equals centered behavior
en_quotes.author: Marilu Henner

en_quotes.quote: Stop being a vegan and start enjoying what you eat
en_quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

en_quotes.quote: I would like to find a stew that will give me heartburn immediately, instead of at three o clock in the morning
en_quotes.author: John Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: I love spaghetti and meatballs... I eat a lot
en_quotes.author: Susan Lucci

en_quotes.quote: An Englishman teaching an American about food is like the blind leading the one-eyed
en_quotes.author: A. J. Liebling

en_quotes.quote: For me, the food I like to make is the food I can enjoy all the time anytime. It's not too calculated or technical
en_quotes.author: Daniel Boulud

en_quotes.quote: Everything in food is science. The only subjective part is when you eat it
en_quotes.author: Alton Brown

en_quotes.quote: Not to like ice cream is to show oneself uninterested in food
en_quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

en_quotes.quote: Food is a passion. Food is love
en_quotes.author: Hector Elizondo

en_quotes.quote: Is Elizabeth Taylor fat? Her favorite food is seconds
en_quotes.author: Joan Rivers

en_quotes.quote: All I do when I write scripts is think about food: 'Have I worked long enough to justify a walk to the kitchen?'
en_quotes.author: Nora Ephron

en_quotes.quote: Health food may be good for the conscience but Oreos taste a hell of a lot better
en_quotes.author: Robert Redford

en_quotes.quote: Revenge is barren of itself: it is the dreadful food it feeds on; its delight is murder, and its end is despair
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: I haven't eaten at a McDonald's since I became President
en_quotes.author: William J. Clinton

en_quotes.quote: My favorite animal is steak
en_quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

en_quotes.quote: If you're going to America, bring your own food
en_quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

en_quotes.quote: People in Slow Food understand that food is an environmental issue
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: Maybe a person's time would be as well spent raising food as raising money to buy food
en_quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

en_quotes.quote: If food were free, why work?
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct
en_quotes.author: Denis Leary

en_quotes.quote: Man is the only animal that can remain on friendly terms with the victims he intends to eat until he eats them
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: Food can offer a moment of pure emotional pleasure in an otherwise hard and difficult world
en_quotes.author: Antoni Porowski

en_quotes.quote: Cocktails and food are social
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: Ever notice that Soup for One is eight aisles away from Party Mix?
en_quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

en_quotes.quote: My idea of fast food is a mallard
en_quotes.author: Ted Nugent

en_quotes.quote: When I eat with my friends, it is a moment of real pleasure, when I really enjoy my life
en_quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

en_quotes.quote: Know how to garnish food so that it is more appealing to the eye and even more flavorful than before
en_quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

en_quotes.quote: The French cook; we open tins
en_quotes.author: John Galsworthy

en_quotes.quote: A 10-pound sack of potatoes lasts a long time
en_quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

en_quotes.quote: The less food, the more time to talk, the more to talk about
en_quotes.author: Damon Wayans

en_quotes.quote: You can't make a souffle rise twice
en_quotes.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

en_quotes.quote: If you are ever at a loss to support a flagging conversation, introduce the subject of eating
en_quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

en_quotes.quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me
en_quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

en_quotes.quote: I'm not an amazing cook. But I can follow a recipe!
en_quotes.author: Rachel McAdams

en_quotes.quote: Get people back into the kitchen and combat the trend toward processed food and fast food
en_quotes.author: Andrew Weil

en_quotes.quote: Food is culture. Food is an identity, a footprint of who you are
en_quotes.author: Lidia Bastianich

en_quotes.quote: It's easy for Americans to forget that the food they eat doesn't magically appear on a supermarket shelf
en_quotes.author: Christopher Dodd

en_quotes.quote: I eat a variety of foods like vegetables, fruit and beef for protein and iron
en_quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Real nutrition comes from soybeans, almonds, rice, and other healthy vegetable sources, not from a cow's udder
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

en_quotes.quote: I never eat in a restaurant that's over a hundred feet off the ground and won't stand still
en_quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

en_quotes.quote: A house is no home unless it contain food and fire for the mind as well as for the body
en_quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Attitudes toward food have completely changed
en_quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

en_quotes.quote: The worst vice of the solitary is the worship of his food
en_quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

en_quotes.quote: I said to my friends that if I was going to starve, I might as well starve where the food is good
en_quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

en_quotes.quote: Food simply isn't important to me
en_quotes.author: Alice Paul

en_quotes.quote: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate
en_quotes.author: Jo Brand

en_quotes.quote: If I had the choice between smoked salmon and tinned salmon, I'd have it tinned. With vinegar
en_quotes.author: Harold Wilson

en_quotes.quote: I like food. I like eating. And I don't want to deprive myself of good food
en_quotes.author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

en_quotes.quote: Miss Child is never bashful with butter
en_quotes.author: Phil Donahue

en_quotes.quote: That's a big goal of mine, to try and grow as much of my own food as possible
en_quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

en_quotes.quote: Food is your body's fuel. Without fuel, your body wants to shut down
en_quotes.author: Ken Hill

en_quotes.quote: The only think I like better than talking about Food is eating
en_quotes.author: John Walters

en_quotes.quote: The food that enters the mind must be watched as closely as the food that enters the body
en_quotes.author: Pat Buchanan

en_quotes.quote: Eating without conversation is only stoking
en_quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

en_quotes.quote: My parents always wanted me to learn about my culture and tried to make me eat Vietnamese food
en_quotes.author: Lana Condor

en_quotes.quote: On my first date, my boyfriend asked me if I wanted to eat a la carte, and I said that I would prefer to stay inside!
en_quotes.author: Cristin Milioti

en_quotes.quote: Confit is the ultimate comfort food, and trendy or not, it is dazzling stuff
en_quotes.author: Sally Schneider

en_quotes.quote: Peruvian food is so simple yet amazingly flavored with their traditional spices
en_quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

en_quotes.quote: Sitting down to a meal with an Indian family is different from sitting down to a meal with a British family
en_quotes.author: Roland Joffe

en_quotes.quote: If I'm making a movie and get hungry, I call time-out and eat some crackers
en_quotes.author: Carol Alt

en_quotes.quote: I think Australian food is probably some of the best in the world
en_quotes.author: Karrie Webb

en_quotes.quote: I always knew that food and wine were vital, with my mother being Italian and a good cook
en_quotes.author: Robert Mondavi

en_quotes.quote: I like to eat and I love the diversity of foods
en_quotes.author: David Soul

en_quotes.quote: The disparity between a restaurant's price and food quality rises in direct proportion to the size of the pepper mill
en_quotes.author: Bryan Q. Miller

en_quotes.quote: The kitchen is a sacred space
en_quotes.author: Marc Forgione
